Interface ITrap

All Known Implementing Classes:
CutieCat, MadScientists, Trap
public interface ITrap
Interface for a trap in the game. A trap can be activated and can be escaped from using specific strategies. Each trap has a name, description, and can be in an active or inactive state.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    activate(GameContext gameContext)
    Activates the trap in the context of the game.
    void

    Allows the player to escape from the trap using a specific strategy.

    Returns the description of the trap.
    String

    Returns the name of the trap.

  • Method Details

    • activate

      void activate(GameContext gameContext)
      Activates the trap in the context of the game. This method defines what happens when the player encounters the trap.
      Parameters:
      gameContext - The current game context, providing information about the player and the environment.

    • escape

      void escape(GameContext gameContext, IEscapeStrategy escapeStrategy)
      Allows the player to escape from the trap using a specific strategy. The strategy defines how the player can escape, which could involve losing power points or using an item.
      Parameters:
      gameContext - The current game context, providing information about the player and the environment.
      escapeStrategy - The strategy used to escape from the trap.

    • getName

      String getName()
      Returns the name of the trap.
      Returns:
      The name of the trap.

    • getDescription

      String getDescription()
      Returns the description of the trap.
      Returns:
      A description of the trap.

    • isActive

      boolean isActive()
      Checks if the trap is currently active.
      Returns:
      true if the trap is active, false otherwise.

    • getEscapeDescription

      String getEscapeDescription()
      Returns the description of the escape options for the trap.
      Returns:
      A description of the escape options for the trap.
